title: Newthinking Lint Rollers, Lint Roller Pet Hair Remover with 2 Handles, 720 Sheets Extra Sticky Lint Roller Refills for Clothes, Pet Hair and Furniture, 8 Refills(90 Sheets Per)
features: Value package: For this lint rollers set, you receive 8 separate rollers with 2 reuseable upgrade handles, which means you can keep one at home and stash the other one in other handy places like your office, car, or bag. Total 720 sheets in one package with great value.

Easy peel off: High quality adhesive for easy removal of sheets, which are pre-cut and spiral wound.Being super sticky, they will catch and hold even the tiniest lint or fluff out there. Just peel, roll and check the results!

Won’t tire your hands: Thanks to its ergonomic and well designed handle, you may rest assured that this lint roller kit will never tire your hands while using or holding.Practical handle with hole; easy to hang up for storage. Sturdy and durable lint roller handle, wouldn't break easily and make sure you never slide off the handle as you’re using it.

Explore its versatile role: Proprietary tape quickly picks up et hair, lint and dust pfrom clothing, Carpet, bed, furniture or virtually anywhere.The lint brush pet hair remover will save you tons of time and energy. Ideal for pet owners!
Refillable & Reusable: Pets never stop shedding, should always clean lint, dust, dirt. High-quality Newthinking Lint Rollers is still ready for cleaning, with refillable rolls and a reusable handle.
